name: Blossom Flower Link
description:
Connect blossom flower to crush them and make a link explosion.
Dash through flower garden and pluck blossomy flower. Link the flowers and eliminate them.
This is the ultimate blossom smasher game with 50 + level will attract you and bind you.
Use different boosters to clear all obstacles. Add power ups by linking same flowers in a flow.

How To Play:

Make a line of blossom flowers and pop them.
Catch the flowers that are identical and smash it.

Features:
==> Lots of fresh flowers.
==> Different and interesting Obstacles.
==> High rated graphic level.
